live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 12:30 PM. Please stay tuned for updates.
37204.summary: Some customers in East St. Paul are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37204.title: May 10 – East St. Paul | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
